item.description:
As something new, we will try a chat follow-up of today's meetup about Flaubert's Madame Bovary. This has been suggested by one of our members, Perkins. This may be of interest to you if:

- you read the book but couldn't attend the meeting
- live further away
- attended the meetup but more things came to mind after the meeting

Anyway, let's try this as an experiment, and see how it goes. If there is an interest for this, and we find that the discussion can work out in a chat forum, we will do this again with other books.

Please RSVP as if this was a regular in-the-flesh meeting.

Instructions:
- Go to www.mirc.com and download the chat program
- Click the button labeled "join"
- There should be a list of chat rooms - click on #classicbooks

group.name: Classic Books: Book Club for Die-hard Readers

item.name: Madame Bovary - Chat Discussion
